items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute dress!
items.body: Absolutely adorable. Very comfortable and love the fit and feel of the dress. It can be dressed up or down depending on the occasion. I want one in every color! It does run a little large, so if you're on the fence for size, I recommend sizing down. Read more
items.author: SEW

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice Sweater Dress and Comfortable
items.body: Nice dress, its actually knitted and comfortable and pretty. Its not made for a small waist, kind of straight but thats a matter of body type. It also isn't hemmed on the edges so its almost like it was raw finish. I got so many compliments and I was very comfortable all day in it! Read more
items.author: Sarrah

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Way too short
items.body: Great dress if it were about 4 inches longer. I have a short waist and long legs, so the fact that it only comes down about 3.5 inches below my crotch means it is very short. I will have to return. Read more
items.author: Cara

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent dress for fall/winter
items.body: I love the dress! I'm a size 16 and the XL fit perfectly. I'm 5'2" and the length was just above my knee, so it might be too short if you're tall. The fabric seems high quality, although I haven't washed it yet, so time will tell. The fabric is very soft and it's a medium weight, which is good for fall and winter. The Houndstooth pattern is a great look to pair with neutral shades of black and beige. I will wear it with a black turtleneck, tights and boots. Read more
items.author: NG

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute, Comfortable, and Easy to Style
items.body: This dress was such a pleasant surprise! For the price, I expected the quality to be lower, but the fabric is soft and thicker than I imagined. I paired it with a white long-sleeve shirt and booties, and it was perfect! Read more
items.author: Tammy Blunt

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute dress doesnâ€™t fit right
items.body: This sweater looks really cute on the model and my sister purchased it and it looked really cute. I felt like it didnâ€™t look really good for my body type and struggled in fitting it and wearing with other items. I also didnâ€™t like how high up the shoulders came. Read more
items.author: Sarah

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adorable and so comfortable!
items.body: Absolutely adorable! The sizing is perfect. Not too tight and not too loose. Just right! Iâ€™m a Mama of 2 older kiddos (14 and 11) and Iâ€™m beyond self conscious of my Mom bod that has hung on for years. I actually feel good in this! Read more
items.author: Samantha

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfy!
items.body: Bought this for my daughter and fit perfectly! Great quality and super soft. The coloring was slightly different than I thought itâ€™d be but not bad. Read more
items.author: Tyler Cone

short_description:
Womens Dress Sleeveless V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Dress Sleeveless V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Sd352, Stb, Brown, Sd142, Blue, Dark Grey, Wa, Black, An425, Gz818, Wine Red, Jh466, Gw304, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
